MedCrypt | Carlsbad, CA | Full-time | Remote/On-site

MedCrypt is building cybersecurity software for medical device vendors, preventing things like pacemakers and CT Scanners from being subjected to malicious hacking. We're hiring a Software Engineer to help build out our cryptography libraries. We are writing much of our code in C, and then transpiling into languages needed by our customers. (We even have a customer building a med device in Node!)

You'd be hire #3, employee #6. Our office is in Carlsbad, CA, but US-based remote workers are cool too.

Email info@medcrypt.co
